long_description: This atlas and gazetteer contains detailed topographic maps of the entire state of Maine. Covers all publicly-owned lands as well as ramps/docks, campgrounds, fishing, hunting and hiking areas; tips on estimating mileage while on trips. Also includes historic sites/museums, information centers, national forests, canoe routes, scenic drives and unique natural features. One half inch represents approximately 1 mile; 80-foot topographic contour intervals.
short_description: This atlas and gazetteer contains detailed topographic maps of the entire state of Maine.
